titleStmt.title: A sermon against lukwarmenesse in religion. Preached at Saint Maries in Oxford, the sixt of September, 1640. / By Henry Wilkinson, Batchelour in Divinity of Magdalen Hall. Printed by order from the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Henry, 1616-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Beale, for Humphrey Robinson, and are to be sold at the Signe of the three Pigeons in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Thomason copy imperfect: some bleed-through of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Signe of the three Pigeons in Pauls Church-yard
